definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ez Eze 26:10 dust—´[[א]] De 28:24 + 3 t.; cstr. [[אֲבַק]] Na 1:3; sf. [[אֲבָקָם]] Ez Eze 26:10—dust (? fleeing, flying; syn. [[עָפָר]] = oft. dust lying on or composing ground) Ex 9:9, Ez Eze 26:10, De 28:24 (‖[[עָפָר]]) Is 5:24 (‖[[מָק]]) Is 29:5 (‖[[מׂץ]]); fig. of clouds under Yahweh's feet Na 1:3.
